TI_TEXT.P: Diensten in verband met de bouw

SHORT_DESCR.P: This tender is for appointment to a framework for Construction Consultants services for new build development work nationally.
Services will include:
— Principal Designer,
— Employers Agent,
— Clerk of Works.
Lots 1-6 will be for Principal Designer services.
Scotland: Glasgow; East Renfrewshire and Renfrewshire; East and West Dunbartonshire; North and South Lanarkshire; City of Edinburgh; East, Mid and West Lothian; and Dundee.
Lot 1-6 Principal Designer.
Lots 1-6 will be for Principal Designer services.
Cumbria: Allerdale; Barrow; Carlisle; Copeland; Eden; and South Lakeland.
